page.description: Converts a number to a blank character string if the number is zero.

prototypes.prototype: Formatted_String as C = ZBLANK( Number as N [, Length as N [, Decimal_Places as N ]] )

argument.name: Length
argument.description: Optional. Default (10). The number of characters in the Formatted_String.

argument.name: Decimal_Places
argument.description: Optional. Default (0). The number of characters after the decimal point in the Formatted_String. If you do not specify decimal places, STR() rounds the Number to the nearest whole number.

page.discussion: ZBLANK() converts a Number to a formatted right justified character string, returning a blank (empty) string if the number is zero.
page.example: zblank(DISCOUNT) -> " ", if DISCOUNT is 0 len3? -> 10 len0? -> 10 zblank(14.3, 10, 3) -> " 14.300"
